::Battera::

Sh looked at him as a few tears rolled down her cheeks. She couldn't 
believe how after all this time, he found her again. "Why would we 
need to get out of here? I finally belong somewhere. Here I am a 
fighter here. I finally found a place where I can belong.  I wasn't 
really welcomed at the maximal ship. But Here? I belong. I found my 
purpose."  Se didn't know it was the chip doing all the talking.  She 
thought about where she last saw Zardus.  "Hmm, I left him int he 
hallway near the labs.  He had that.."she almost lost her temper 
again,"that little bird queen bot that stopped by here." She looked 
at the wall and lost it.  She slammed her fist into the wall and 
looked at the small dent her fist left behind.  She turned and looked 
at CyberShark,"Sorry, I just can't stand that femme bot."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
>    
>     He embraced Battera back. "Yes, Battera, it's really me."
>     He looked at her and almost wept.
>     "We're going to need to get out of here."
>     He had his plan all formulated in his mind, he knew about the 
chip that made him "Predacon" but since he was already similar to the 
Predacons (Destron) the chip only made him really want to follow 
Zardus. He also knew that he would never be able to over power 
Zardus, that the only way he would be able to escape was to get on an 
away from base mission and cloak.
>     "I need to speak to Zardus," He said to Battera in a very 
buisness like tone. "Can you tell me where he is?"
